author: iSazonov
body: deb packages still have "_" in name powershell_6.0.1-1.ubuntu.17.04_amd64.deb

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @iSazonov is there a requirements document somewhere that says that this is required?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
I found it https://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/debian-reference/ch02.en.html#_debian_package_file_names

They use "_"  like `<package-name>_<epoch>:<upstream-version>-<debian.version>-<architecture>.deb`

So I close the Issue.

title: Need fix deb package names
